word:
"We came home and I set out my things in my garden of [the] 
     new house by moonlight and by the aid of lamplight. The two Marys 
     tried to have me wait till morning, but I would not listen to them. 
     We had a beautiful shower last night. I was glad then I persevered 
     in setting out my plants."--Letter 4, 1876. 


                                    -282-
